languages.text: "Инквизитор, зовущийся Калькасаром, прислал призыв о помощи. Совет командиров решил не отказывать и направил две стаи в Простор, хоть мы и не доверяли этому "союзнику". Но обязывал нас откликнуться кровавый долг за услугу, оказанную в прошлом".

"An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."
languages.original_text: "Инквизитор, зовущийся Калькасаром, прислал призыв о помощи. Совет командиров решил не отказывать и направил две стаи в Простор, хоть мы и не доверяли этому "союзнику". Но обязывал нас откликнуться кровавый долг за услугу, оказанную в прошлом".

traits.locale_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar sent out a call for aid. The Einherjar council decided to acquiesce and sent two packs to the Expanse, although we never trusted this 'ally.'"
"An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar sent out a call for aid. The Einherjar council decided to acquiesce and sent two packs to the Expanse, although we never trusted this 'ally.'"
"An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar sent out a call for aid. The Einherjar council decided to acquiesce and sent two packs to the Expanse, although we never trusted this 'ally.'"

"An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this 'ally,' but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

languages.text: «Un Inquisidor llamado Calcazar envió una llamada de auxilio. Mi Señor Lobo decidió no darle la espalda y decidió desplegar dos jaurías en la Extensión. No confiábamos en este aliado, pero una deuda de sangre por servicios pasados nos obligaba».
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: «Un Inquisidor llamado Calcazar envió una llamada de auxilio. El consejo de comandantes decidió no darle la espalda y envió a dos jaurías a la Extensión. No confiábamos en este "aliado", pero una deuda de sangre por servicios pasados nos obligaba».

languages.text: “一位名叫卡尔卡扎的审判官发来了求援信号。我的野狼领主认为不该拒绝他的请求，于是向科罗努斯扩区派出了两支狼群。我们从来没信任过这个‘盟友’，但过去欠下的血债，让我们不得不出手相助。”
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: “一位名叫卡尔卡扎的审判官发来了求援信号。我的野狼领主认为不该拒绝他的请求，于是向科罗努斯扩区派出了两支狼群。我们从来没信任过这个‘盟友’，但过去欠下的血债，让我们不得不出手相助。”
“一位名叫卡尔卡扎的审判官发来了求援信号。我的野狼领主认为不该拒绝他的请求，于是向科罗努斯扩区派出了两支狼群。我们从来没信任过这个‘盟友’，但过去欠下的血债，让我们不得不出手相助。”

languages.text: 「カルカサルという名の異端審問官が助けを求めたんだ。ウルフロードは、それを拒絶しないことに決め、2つの群れをエクスパンスに派遣した。我々はこの同盟者を決して信頼していなかったが、過去に受けた奉仕に対する血の恩義のせいで、手を出さないわけには行かなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: 「カルカサルという名の異端審問官が助けを求めたんだ。ウルフロードは、それを拒絶しないことに決め、2つの群れをエクスパンスに派遣した。我々はこの同盟者を決して信頼していなかったが、過去に受けた奉仕に対する血の恩義のせいで、手を出さないわけには行かなかったのだ」
「カルカサルという名の異端審問官が助けを求めたんだ。ウルフロードは、それを拒絶しないことに決め、2つの群れをエクスパンスに派遣した。我々はこの「同盟者」を決して信頼していなかったが、過去に受けた奉仕に対する血の恩義のせいで、手を出さないわけには行かなかったのだ」

languages.text: « Un inquisiteur répondant au nom de Calcazar a lancé un appel à l'aide. Mon Seigneur Loup a décidé d'y répondre et a envoyé deux meutes dans les Étendues. Nous n'avions aucune confiance en cet allié, mais une dette de sang pour service rendu par le passé nous a forcé la main. »
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: « Un inquisiteur répondant au nom de Calcazar a lancé un appel à l'aide. Mon Seigneur Loup a décidé d'y répondre et a envoyé deux meutes dans les Étendues. Nous n'avions aucune confiance en cet allié, mais une dette de sang pour service rendu par le passé nous a forcé la main. »

languages.text: "Ein Inquisitor namens Calcazar hat um Hilfe gebeten. Mein Wolfslord hat ihn nicht abgewiesen und zwei Rudel in die Ausdehnung beordert. Wir haben diesem Verbündeten nie vertraut, doch eine Blutschuld für einen früher einmal erbrachten Gefallen hat uns dazu gezwungen."
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Inquisitor namens Calcazar hat um Hilfe gebeten. Der Rat der Kommandanten hat entschieden, sie ihm zu gewähren, und hat zwei Rudel in die Ausdehnung geschickt. Wir haben diesem 'Verbündeten' nie vertraut, doch eine Blutschuld für einen früher einmal erbrachten Gefallen hat uns dazu gezwungen."

"Ein Inquisitor namens Calcazar hat um Hilfe gebeten. Mein Wolfslord hat ihn nicht abgewiesen und zwei Rudel in die Ausdehnung beordert. Wir haben diesem 'Verbündeten' nie vertraut, doch eine Blutschuld für einen früher einmal erbrachten Gefallen hat uns dazu gezwungen."

languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this 'ally,' but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

languages.text: "Calcazar adında bir Engizisyoncu yardım istedi. Kurt Lordum onu reddetmedi ve Enginlik'e iki sürü gönderdi. Bu müttefikimize hiç güvenmesek de geçmişte sağlanan bir hizmetin kan borcu, elimizi kolumuzu bağladı."
languages.original_text: "An Inquisitor by the name of Calcazar put out a call for aid. My Wolf Lord did not refuse him and had two packs deployed to the Expanse. We never trusted this ally, but a blood debt for a service rendered in the past forced our hand."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar adında bir Engizisyoncu yardım istedi. Kurt Lordum onu reddetmedi ve Enginlik'e iki sürü gönderdi. Bu müttefikimize hiç güvenmesek de geçmişte sağlanan bir hizmetin kan borcu, elimizi kolumuzu bağladı."
